item.title: New Tourist eSIM Plan: 3GB for 14 Days at $12
item.description: Perfect for extended stays in Myanmar! Our new Tourist Plus plan offers 3GB of high-speed data valid for 14 days, ideal for travelers exploring multiple cities.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing Tourist Plus eSIM Plan

We're excited to announce our latest eSIM offering designed specifically for travelers who need reliable connectivity during extended stays in Myanmar.

Plan Features:

  • 3GB High-Speed Data - Perfect for maps, messaging, and social media
  • 14-Day Validity - Extended coverage for longer trips
  • 4G/5G Networks - Fast speeds across Myanmar
  • Instant Activation - Ready to use in minutes
  • No Roaming Charges - Local rates throughout Myanmar

Perfect For:

✓ Extended business trips
✓ Multi-city tourism
✓ Digital nomads
✓ Backpackers exploring Myanmar

Coverage Areas:

Full coverage in Yangon, Mandalay, Naypyidaw, Bagan, Inle Lake, and major highways connecting these cities.

Get Tourist Plus Plan - $12

Available now with instant QR code delivery via email.
item.author: team@esim-myanmar.com (eSIM Myanmar Team)

item.title: Complete Guide to eSIM Setup in Myanmar 2025
item.description: Step-by-step guide to activating your eSIM in Myanmar. Compatible devices, network settings, and troubleshooting tips included.
item.content:encoded:
Everything You Need to Know About eSIM in Myanmar

Setting up an eSIM in Myanmar has never been easier. Follow our comprehensive guide to get connected in minutes.

What You'll Need:

  • eSIM-compatible device (iPhone XS or newer, Google Pixel 3 or newer, etc.)
  • Stable WiFi connection for initial setup
  • QR code from your eSIM purchase

Step-by-Step Setup:

  1. Purchase your eSIM - Choose from our range of plans
  2. Receive QR code - Delivered instantly to your email
  3. Scan & Install - Use your phone's camera or settings
  4. Activate - Turn on your new eSIM line
  5. Enjoy! - You're connected to Myanmar's networks

Read Full Guide →
item.author: team@esim-myanmar.com (eSIM Myanmar Team)
item.dc:creator: Myanmar Tech Team
